mapper.select: select esp.id, si.code, si.name, si.description, esp.default_result defaultResult from ent_survey_plan esp inner join survey_item si on esp.survey_item_id = si.id and si.valid = 1 and si.type = 'basic' where esp.valid = 1 and esp.ent_id = #{param.enterpriseId} order by si.sort_num

select esp.id, si.code, si.name, si.description, si.importance, si.cost, si.target_weight_code targetWeightCode, erar.assess_value assessValue, esp.default_result defaultResult, si.has_attachment hasAttachment from ent_survey_plan esp inner join survey_item si on esp.survey_item_id = si.id and si.valid = 1 and si.type = 'intensive' left join ent_risk_assess_result erar on erar.id = esp.ent_target_result_id where esp.valid = 1 and esp.ent_id = #{param.enterpriseId} order by si.sort_num
